name: Camtasia Studio Zipped Library File
summary: A LIBZIP file is a zipped library used by TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing program. It contains media assets such as intro titles, presets, and themes. Camtasia users export and import libraries as LIBZIP files with the software to share assets with other team members or Camtasia installations on other computers.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
